definitions.definition: A person or thing who enjoys special regard or favour .
examples: The teacher's favourite always went first.

definitions.definition: A person who is preferred or trusted above all others.
A contestant or competitor thought most likely to win .
examples: You were my favourite to win the spelling competition.
She's the favourite , she'll probably be elected.

definitions.definition: A bookmark in a web browser .
A short curl dangling over the temples , fashionable in the reign of Charles II .

main_definition: A person or thing who enjoys special regard or favour .
secondary_definitions: A person who is preferred or trusted above all others.
A contestant or competitor thought most likely to win .
( Internet ) A bookmark in a web browser .
( in the plural ) A short curl dangling over the temples , fashionable in the reign of Charles II .
